text:
“I posted to my personal FB...I never imagined it wld leave my personal page”

At this point, "going viral" is a part of our lexicon. And viral posts on Twitter come from every platform. Ppl literally screenshot the posts,so she's FOS

Further illustrates her lack of intelligence

author: LikeLotionForAsh
text:
"In her Facebook apology, Johnson noted that what she did is a common practice in hiring."

Common practice, huh? Recruiters & HR continue to be the gatekeepers for/door openers to workplace hell. 

I also want to note that she had a choice, whether she wants to own that or not.
